meanings.definition: Developed or executed with care and detail.
meanings.sent1: The artist's elaborated painting was full of intricate details.
meanings.sent2: She wore an elaborated dress to the fancy party.
meanings.sent3: The chef's elaborated cake looked almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent4: The garden was an elaborated masterpiece of colors and scents.
meanings.sent5: The elaborate castle was an elaborated sight to behold.

meanings.definition: To add more detail or information to something.
meanings.sent1: He elaborated on his story to make it more interesting.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the student to elaborate on his answer.
meanings.sent3: The detective elaborated on the suspect's alibi.
meanings.sent4: She elaborated her essay with additional examples.
meanings.sent5: The scientist elaborated his theory with new evidence.

meanings.definition: To produce or create something more complex or detailed.
meanings.sent1: The designer elaborated a stunning new collection.
meanings.sent2: The team elaborated a plan to tackle the project.
meanings.sent3: The chef elaborated a unique dish for the menu.
meanings.sent4: The author elaborated a thrilling plot for the novel.
meanings.sent5: The artist elaborated a beautiful sculpture from clay.
